version_description:
our facebook page is SuperMii,you can talk and feedback with us at there!
the words you send via comment and facebook and QQ group,we all have received and try some ways to be better!Thanks for your support!!

V1.8.4 update content:
1.added a number of material (include the union jack flag)
2.added facial expression,you can share and talk with your friends use these look,so funny.
3.added a number of glasses,someone like me who myopia have benefit
4.modify the bugs,like news disppear,hair shade,dialogue bubble could not exit out and so on.

[HANDBOOK GROWING TO 150] HANDBOOK already growing to 150... hurry up collecting lovers!
[BROWS COULD CHANGE COLOR] Choose brows, click COLOR, change brows' color by one step
[ADDED PERSONAL CENTER] HISTROY can be synchronize with one's account, don not worry about change phone, these matriel will be lost.
[ADDED PICTURE SHOW] show your best picture, let others view and admire!

PS: PICTURE SHOW still be Optimizing, if you have some suggestion, told us!

version_name: 2.4.0 update content:[FIX]fix bug when comment or send message crash[ADD]HANDBOOK added to 300if you still have something suggestion or advice

version_description:
V2.3.0 Update Content:

[New Feature]Added achievement system, let us become overachieve!
[New Feature]Added FOLLOW feature, if like him/she follow them!
[New material]Added HANDBOOK to 243#
[Fix] optimization when posting comments flash back, unable to post questions
[To Feedback-Guys]These material (Black Rock Shooter/Shindou Takuto/伏见猿比古/creepypasta/beard/pose)you wanted all added, if you wanted more, please tell us.

To all guys:

Thanks for your support and love. all of feedback and comment we all got them, and do our best fix or added them. following is our answer to some comment. if you have any more problem or suggestion, maybe you can send us Email. Email: supermii.yi@qq.com

1.We have DBZ items, maybe you can get them from RANDOM —— TO LOLSBOMB
2.I so sorry for crashing... we fix now this version, can you give us a chance again? if still crashing... please tell us.. Email: supermii.yi@qq.com —— To It's Doodle
3.Thanks for your recommend.can you send us your Email that you use to register before? we can help you found previous username and password, and restore your items.Email: supermii.yi@qq.com —— TO VladlenPavelovTheThird
4.Choose Face,click COLOR, you can change the character face's color.—— To Keleeh1

version_name: 2.4.0 update content:[FIX]fix bug when comment or send message crash[ADD]HANDBOOK added to 300if you still have something suggestion or advice

version_name: 2.8.1 update content:[Brand Upgrade]: SuperMii renamed SuperMe

version_description:
1. New sets. Rahm, Liam, Huoying, early four generation Huoying, black Wukong and so on.
2. Fix some inexplicable bug.

Engineers earlier to save Pluto, just landed. Looking forward to the next big action The.Demon team.

V3.2.0 update content:

1. The programmer went to Thailand have a holiday and still remember to work, fixed a bug.
2. [Activity] and [Announcement] are merged!
3. [HandBook] added 15 roles!
4.[Game Center] has added several new games
5. [Mysterious Gift] There is a surprise!

2. [Activity] and [Announcement] are merged!
3. [HandBook] added 15 roles!
4.[Game Center] has added several new games
5. [Mysterious Gift] There is a surprise!

Update Content
1. [ADD] New Muslim headscarves, more accessories will be added later!
2. [ADD] Added a one-month log-in, go to get a lot of rewards!
3. [ADD] 6 new characters have been added to the HANDBOOK, go to check it out!
4. [Optimization] Optimized some UI and the game TAPTAPME
6. [Repair]Fixed some bugs
7. [Activity] Call for | "Me and My SUPERMII", you can share with us in graphic or video format. Every participant will get 500S coins reward! Send email to us: supermii.yi@qq.com
